rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan living space with an integrated kitchen area, designed to maximize natural light and ventilation. Features built-in storage and modern fixtures.
Spacious bedroom with direct access to a private balcony. Designed for relaxation and natural lighting, adhering to Vastu principles by orienting the bed eastward.
Modern bedroom with a private balcony and contemporary design. Bed placement follows Vastu guidelines, ensuring optimal energy flow.
Contemporary ensuite bathroom with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Elegant entry point on the west side with a vestibule that leads into the living area. Designed for optimal security and natural lighting.
Balcony access points integrated into both bedrooms, providing outdoor space with a view and natural ventilation.
Service access for utilities and maintenance located at the north-east corner, ensuring minimal disruption to living spaces.

vastu_considerations: Living area oriented to the north-west for optimal energy flow.
Bedrooms oriented with doors facing east to promote positive energy.
Balconies designed to be open and unobstructed, encouraging natural light and air circulation.
